NAME: gtts
AUTHOR: FlapJack
SHORT: Plays Google text-to-speech audio in voice channel
DESCRIPTION:
Uses Google TTS to convert your text into spoken audio in a voice channel. Useful for people without microphones, or when you want something better than Discord's built in TTS.

Dependencies:
gTTS :: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/gTTS
INSTALL_MSG: Thanks for installing gtts. This cog was recently developed and has not been thoroughly tested yet. I appreciate any feedback.
